page.title: 02Houses we live in.
page.content: { Houses we live in. Almost all the children in Coates Primary School live within our grid area.We collected data on the types of homes our school children live in.New refers to homes built in the last 20 years.R=Rented.O=Owned. Old detached houses 23 1 R 22 O New detached houses 5 5 O Old semidetached houses 18 5 R 13 O New semidetached houses 9 1 R 8 O Old detached bungalow 5 1 R 4 O New detached bungalow 12 1 R 11 O Old semi-d bungalows 5 1 R 4 O New semi-d bungalows 1 1 O Old terraced houses 8 4 R 4 O New terraced houses 2 2 O New flat 1 1 R Caravan 1 1 R Old cottage 2 2 O Most houses are built of bricks from the local London Brick Company.
